title: From the Ghost of Ash Monroe
description: Ash Monroe is a ghost of a boy haunting his town with no memories of how he died, until one day his panic attack almost caused a haunting that led to a car crush. Fortunately, a mysterious young woman appeared who can see ghosts and is possessed by a demon reverted Ash’s haunting before anyone got hurt. The woman, who goes by Ting, agrees to give Ash unprofessional ghost therapy in order to help Ash learn to control his ghostly powers and regain his memories. At the same time, Ash Monroe‘s older sister Celia and his best friend Phil both returned to a town they both ran away from after hearing about Ash. They both believe that what happened to Ash was not an accident, and are ready to do anything to find the truth. This is a story about grief, healing, and forgiving oneself for the mistakes one made in the past while also looking towards the future.
author: Dawn Chen
